item.title: Sam Altman Slams Meta’s AI Talent Poaching Spree: 'Missionaries Will Beat Mercenaries'
item.description: “What Meta is doing will, in my opinion, lead to very deep cultural problems,” said OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in a leaked memo sent to OpenAI researchers.

item.title: Trump’s New Fragrance Doesn’t Smell Like Success
item.description: Early reviews are in for the US president's “rallying cry in a bottle”—and they’re not good. It also costs $249.
